stories.headline: Data Reveals City Workers' Bonus Pay
stories.summary: Explores a payroll-padding scandal at the Houston City Hall involving improper bonus payments to city employees.

stories.headline: Plug Into Data to Investigate Utilities
stories.summary: Presents an investigation of energy utilities using data analysis to challenge utility demands and decisions.

stories.headline: Tracking Federal Funds: Indian Grants, Gaming Revenue Both on the Rise
stories.summary: An examination of the rise in both Indian gaming revenues and federal grants to tribes over several years.

stories.headline: NY Power Agency Gives $1 Million to Leaders' Pet Projects, Charities
stories.summary: Investigates the New York Power Authority's misuse of funds for personal and political gain.

stories.headline: Gas Pump Inspections Make Speedy CAR Story
stories.summary: Analyzes the accuracy of gas pumps in Utah, revealing frequent inaccuracies in measurement.
